name: BillingDetails
description: In the context of CASS2. process; BillingDetails object is used to integrate specific Billing and Settlement data requirements

columns.name: adjustments
columns.description: Information about Adjustments performed on the BillingDetails

columns.name: awbUseIndicator
columns.description: It must either contain the values of R for Revenue AWB; V for Void AWB or S for Service AWB.

columns.name: taxDueAgent
columns.description: Tax due Agent (VAT/GST on Commission). Total VAT/TAX amount payable by airline to agent

columns.name: taxDueAirline
columns.description: Tax due Airline (as per AWB; or VAT/GST as per invoice). Total VAT/TAX amount payable by agent to airline

columns.name: awbAcceptanceDate
columns.description: The Date AWB Acceptance should be the same as the Date AWB Delivery. (beginning of the process)

columns.name: awbDeliveryDate
columns.description: The Date AWB Delivery is also used as the AWB Execution date which will determine which billing period it will be processed and billed in.

columns.name: awbExecutionDate
columns.description: The AWB execution date determines which billing period the document will be processed and billed in.

columns.name: commission
columns.description: The commission amount in favour of the Cargo Agent/Associate; applicable for the shipment concerned

columns.name: commissionIndicator
columns.description: Indicates if commission is applied. Boolean

columns.name: commissionPercentage
columns.description: The commission percentage in favour of the Cargo Agent/Associate; applicable for the shipment concerned

columns.name: discount
columns.description: This is used as a discount to the ‚Äúofficial‚Äù transportation charge on AWB to arrive at actual selling price

columns.name: exchangeRate
columns.description: The Rate at which the Air Waybill Amount has been multiplied to arrive at the amount of settlement.

columns.name: nbCorrections
columns.description: Number of corrections to CASS records

columns.name: checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object
